title: How to Make Oregano Olive Oil

steps.headline: Add the herbs to the oil.
steps.description: You can either transfer the oil to a decorative bottle or leave it in the original bottle that it was purchased in.

steps.headline: Leave the herbs to steep in the oil for 7 days.
Store.
steps.description: If you wish to strain the herbs and simply have clear oil, remove the herbs before storing. Otherwise, leave the herbs in the oil.

steps.headline: Use.
steps.description: This olive oil is excellent used on pizzas, in salad dressings and in other savoury recipes that would normally take plain olive oil.

text: Add the herbs to the oil. You can either transfer the oil to a decorative bottle or leave it in the original bottle that it was purchased in. Leave the herbs to steep in the oil for 7 days.  Store. If you wish to strain the herbs and simply have clear oil, remove the herbs before storing. Otherwise, leave the herbs in the oil. Use. This olive oil is excellent used on pizzas, in salad dressings and in other savoury recipes that would normally take plain olive oil.
